thread.title: Bella Hadid's Bringing Back the Skirt You Used to Wear With Your Abercrombie Tee
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid's Bringing Back the Skirt You Used to Wear With Your Abercrombie Tee

author: Sarah Wasilak
title: Bella Hadid's Bringing Back the Skirt You Used to Wear With Your Abercrombie Tee
text:
Bella Hadid Denim Skirt June 2016 Bella Hadid's Bringing Back the Skirt You Used to Wear With Your Abercrombie Tee   Bella Hadid's Bringing Back the Skirt You Used to Wear With Your Abercrombie Tee 
While denim will never go out of style, trends and cuts come and go. But we've got a good feeling about Bella Hadid's distressed skirt. Something tells us the throwback mini, shredded at the hem, and complete with just one button instead of a whole row, is back. While we used to throw on such a design with glittering graphic tees from Abercrombie, or yes, even Limited Too, Bella shows us the perfect way to refresh our old '90s look . 
Slip into a cami and accent with matching accessories — the supermodel chose patent leather moto boots and a Givenchy bag — then hit the road. Read on to get inspired by Bella's outfit, then check out how Kim Kardashian recently wore the trend , and shop the skirt that'll fast become your go-to once again. Related:
